title: Nidalee's problem isn't her offensive power at all...
body:
It's her safety.

If it felt like there was ever an ACTUAL opportunity to kill her, ever, without her saying "shit i fucked up lol" and dashing away 2-3 times at no cost then healing back up, then her offense wouldn't be so horrifically annoying.

As it stands, she forces the lane into the uninteractive pattern of, **"Either I snowball, or we both AFK farm.  Period."**

And it's NOT HEALTHY.  Why do you think people hate Zed? You're IMMEDIATELY put on the defensive; There's no kill potential for you, no chance for you to punish their mistakes - it's just all about you having to go the extra mile to not get killed repeatedly.

Nerf her hop (when she's using it to escape, rather than engage) and replace the heal.

I find {{champion:76}}  to be massively overrated for the same reason I find {{champion:53}}  to be massively overrated. They both have skillsets that are amazing before a fight starts and nearly worthless once an initiation has been made. Getting a hard initiation on a Nid or Blitz team in a 5v5 teamfight is nearly a guaranteed win if you don't have a massive gold deficit. You don't even have to kill Nidalee once a fight starts; just kill her team. Who cares if she can always run away, she's not gonna defend that inhib turret 1v4 or even 1v5.

If the enemy is already running from the teamfight, then your team has already won the fight and it has nothing to do with you. But in a full 5v5 teamfight, where neither side is forced to try and run away, Blitz has the least contribution of any support, by far. Blitz can't stop a hard dive, he can't buff his allies in any way without items, and his counter-engage is also weak. Compared the what a {{champion:412}}{{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:89}}{{champion:143}}  or {{champion:1}} contributes in a full out battle, Blitz's teamfighting power is a joke.

And {{champion:76}} is exactly the same way. She's literally only good against teams that can't engage on her team. Because what does Nidalee actually do once a full 5v5 starts? Heal her adc once and maybe hit a short range spear on a tank? She can't CC anybody. She can't tank anything. And she can't delete anyone without first landing her slow skillshot. All Nidalees do is run away while the rest of her team dies and then be unable to defend any objectives by herself.
